dict.acceptation: 本国的；土著的；天生的；天真的，纯朴的；
当地人；土著人；当地产的动（植）物；

sent.orig: Then tried to translate J2ME APIs into native codes and made the speed comparison.
sent.trans: 作者首先用代码优化的方式来减少程序占用的内存大小，然后尝试将部分J2ME的APIs native化，并比较了native化前后程序的执行速度。

sent.orig: All questions are pre-tested on diverse samples of native and non-native speakers.
sent.trans: 所有的问题都经历了事先的测定，测评对象为多个本地及非本地测试人群的样本。

sent.orig: Only when the blood native son flows back to his native place will It'stop boiling.
sent.trans: 原乡人的血，必须流返原乡，才会停止沸腾。

sent.orig: Generally speaking, there is no obvious preference to either native-speaking or non-native English speaking teachers.
sent.trans: 总的来说，对于中国教师还是外籍教师学生没有明显的偏好。

sent.orig: Native Speakers: Does the provider work with translators who are native speakers of the languages?
sent.trans: 母语译者：此公司是否雇用以译入语言为母语的翻译者？
